00011 // profiling is platform dependent
00012 #ifdef PLATFORM_WIN32
00013     typedef __int64 rdtsc_t;
00014     __declspec(naked) static __int64 rdtsc()
00015     {
00016         __asm
00017         {
00018             RDTSC
00019             ret
00020         }
00021     }
00022 #else
00023     typedef int rdtsc_t;
00024     static int rdtsc() {return 0;}
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 
00053 class Profile
00054 {
00055 public:
00056     enum
00057     {
00059         MAX_BLOCKS  = 256,
00061         MAX_NAME    = 16
00062     };
00063 
00070     Profile( int id, const char* sz )   : m_id(id) {if (!sm_names[id][0]) setName(id,sz); m_time=rdtsc();}
00071 
00075     ~Profile()                          {m_time=rdtsc()-m_time; sm_times[m_id] += m_time; sm_counts[m_id] += 1;}
00076 
00083     static void         beginFrame();
00084 
00089     static void         endFrame();
00090 
00094     static const char*  getName( int i );
00095 
00099     static float        getPercent( int i );
00100 
00104     static int          getCount( int i );
00105 
00109     static int          blocks();
00110 
00114     static void         reset();
00115 
00121     static int          id();
00122 
00123 private:
00124     int             m_id;
00125     rdtsc_t         m_time;
00126 
00127     static int      sm_id;
00128     static bool     sm_init;
00129     static rdtsc_t  sm_time;
00130     static double   sm_scale;
00131     static rdtsc_t  sm_times[MAX_BLOCKS];
00132     static int      sm_counts[MAX_BLOCKS];
00133     static char     sm_names[MAX_BLOCKS][MAX_NAME];
00134 
00135     static void     init();
00136     static int      indexToId( int i );
00137     static void     setName( int id, const char* sz );
00138 };
